content.rendered:
Directed by Boyapati Srinu

Written by Boyapati Srinu

Cast Ram Charan Teja (Konidela Ram Charan). Vivek Oberoi (Raja Bhai Munna). Kiara Advani (Seeta). Mahesh Manjrekar (Bihar Chief Minister). Prashanth (Konidela Bhuvan Kumar). Sneha (Konidela Gayatri Devi). Aryan Rajesh (Sekar). Madhumitha (Ram’s 2nd sister-in-law). Ravi Varma (Raju). Praveena (Sailaja). Madhunandan (Ram’s fourth brother). Himaja (Ram’s 3rd sister-in-law). Mukesh Rishi (Pandyam Parasuram). Harish Uthaman (Ballem Balaram). Salim Baig(Ranjith Singh). V. Jayaprakash (Andhra Pradesh Governor). Chalapathi Rao (Konidela Subramanyam). Hema (Madhavi / Puppy). Prudhviraj (Dharmendra). G.V. Sudhakar Naidu (Raja Bhai’s goon). Priyadarshini Ram (Encounter specialist Shankar). Esha Gupta (Sharanya). Aadhithya. Aadhya Aarnav. Nijat Adgozalli (Police officer). Ajay. Akhil. Akshara. Aravind. Bhanu. Bharani. Anand Bharathi. Bhasha. Chandu. Sri Devi. Ghani. Isha Guptha. Sri Harsha.Master Hridyansh. JaiDev. Jeshan. Kiran. Krishna Kranthi (Officer). Krishna. Unni Krishna. Kiran Kumar. Chittineni Lakshminarayana. Loknadh. Mahendra. Sri Mithra. Musthaafa. Nani. Salim Panda. Pavan. Jaya Prakash. Prasad. Praveena. Prudhwi. Rajesh. Rajkiran. Kanaka Raju. Rakhi. Sakshi Ram. Ramakrishna. Dil Ramesh. Koteswara Rao. Ram Reddy. Ramana Reddy. Rehman. Rohan. Tota Roy Chowdhury. Rupa. Uma Sainadh. Sanjana. Malhottra Shivam (Special Investivagation officer). Sunil ((as Suneel)). Silver Suresh. Sairaj Suthari (Main villain Gang). Irfan Ahmed Syed (Raja Babu (as Irfan)). Teja. Vayu. Veena. Vidhignya. Yogi

Languages Telugu

Producers Ayan. Sahni Bob. D.V.V. Danayya. Emin Guliyev. Vijay Jagarlamudi. KS Jairam. Dasari Kalyan. Nariman Mammadov. V.Y. Praveenkumar

Production DVV Entertainmen. Goldmines Telefilm
